detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract SurfEx (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SurfEx.sol#848-859) has payable functions:
	 - SurfEx.constructor(string,string,uint256,uint8) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SurfEx.sol#850-855)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
